Package order

Class W4CLoginController

  • java.lang.Object
    • order.W4CLoginController
  • public class W4CLoginController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is for login with W4C card user can input card number manually or getting the number from QR
    Since:
    01.01.2022
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Matan Weisberg

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void initialize()
      This func initializes our controller set login button to disable and set a listener for textinput when user enters number button will be enable
      (package private) void qrScanSimulation​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
      This func is for loading pop up for the QR simulation
      void setW4CInput​(java.lang.String w4c_code)
      This func is for setting the w4c input number from user
      (package private) void verifyW4C​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This func verifies the enterd number with the DB if The number is NOT correct a error message will be set if card number is correct but user have a not approved business account and no private account an error message will present

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        This func initializes our controller set login button to disable and set a listener for textinput when user enters number button will be enable

      • verifyW4C

        void verifyW4C​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This func verifies the enterd number with the DB if The number is NOT correct a error message will be set if card number is correct but user have a not approved business account and no private account an error message will present
        Parameters:
        event - - action event for pressing login button

      • setW4CInput

        public void setW4CInput​(java.lang.String w4c_code)
        This func is for setting the w4c input number from user
        Parameters:
        w4c_code - - user W4c input

      • qrScanSimulation

        void qrScanSimulation​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
        This func is for loading pop up for the QR simulation
        Parameters:
        event - - mouse event for pressing qr image
